languageKey.label: XML Import

Imports XML Data from a file into any given TYPO3 table. Use the upload form to submit a file, or simply select it from the fileadmin folder using the selectbox. Your admin may have set a standard directory or file for you. If nothing else is specified, records will be imported into the current page.
This part is a predefined section and can be used to demonstrate coding syntax.
